title: Epidemic Surveillance Using an Electronic Medical Record: An Empiric Approach to Performance Improvement
text:
Most automated surveillance systems utilize diagnostic codes to find diseased individuals
 Our results further argue that diagnostic codes sets used for case-detection should routinely optimized during surveillance system development or expansion

title: Internet-based surveillance systems for monitoring emerging infectious diseases
text:
68 These studies show potential applications of internet-based surveillance systems in bolstering traditional surveillance system capacity and guiding public health action
